Martin Odermatt

My name is Martin Odermatt and I study 'Software and Data Engineering' here at USI. I graduated with a BSc in Computer Science. I used to work as a 'Working Student' in the areas of .NET, Java, JavaScript and web applications. 

 Wanyang Hu 

 My name is Wanyang Hu and I am Chinese. I'm studying Artificial Intelligence at USI. I worked as a product manager at an Internet company before I came to Lugano. I have a bechelor in Information engineering from Jinan University in China. 

 Segilola Mustapha 

 My name is Segilola Mustapha, I am from Nigeria and studied Computer Science for my bachelor. I did an Internship at the United Nations in Geneva where I worked on their new website project using Drupal, Twig and Pattern Lab. I am studying Software and Data Engineering at USI. 

 You can visit our Github repository at: https://github.com/marodev/android-semester-project
